In this transferred post, we have transformed the attributional style from stable (repressing emotions) to unstable (current challenges). We have also kept the event part of the post intact, only modifying the attribution style. The new post attributes the event of people being happy to a temporary lack of motivation or current overwhelming workload, rather than a permanent character flaw.
